author: ianna
body:
- First version of post LS2 beam pipe

There are a few open issues:
- The new description has an overlap with Tracker volume in z=1630 mm where Pixel supports are installed. Gabrielle Hugo will look into it.
- Due to overlaps Totem and BRM were removed from the scenario. It needs to be checked if other forward sub-detectors should be (re-)included. To be checked, then update the rest of 2023 scenarios.
- Very forward region beyond 16377 mm is not described - waiting for more details from engineers. Weights of pump station, support and bellow to be verified.
title: Post LS2 Beam pipe
